channel.title: Airports on Joce Rose

item.title: Panama City Airport
item.description: Visit Log: Nov 19 and Nov 24 Panama City Airport is going under some construction. If you are having a transfer there, and need to get from Terminal 1 to 2–be ready to run! It’s a long way away from one end to the other. Generally, it’s in a “U”-ish shape. Some of Terminal 2 windows face inward towards Terminal 1. Also–there are very few places to eat there, even though there are a lot of shops.
